icon-disabled.comment: Used if a icon element is disabled.

icon-on-action.comment: Used as a icon color on containers with action primary color.

icon-on-surface-highlight.comment: Used as icon color on containers with highlight color.

icon-on-critical.comment: Used as a icon color on containers with critical color.

icon-on-success.comment: Used as a icon color on containers with success color.

icon-on-image.comment: Used as a icon color on “Surface On Image/Default”.
